Post-Match Reflections: The Trail Blazers finished off their 2024 Monday night versus the 76ers at Moda Center with an ugly game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greg Oden's return to Portland, his visit to the practice facility and his thoughts on how he looks back on his time with the Trail Blazers.
Others: The Trail Blazers will celebrate the New Year with a classic games marathon, watch parties, and a new way to watch.
